name: Woody Battle 2 - Multiplayer
description:
Stay home, stay safe, and get excited on this brand new multiplayer game! Introducing Classic 1vs1, Skills Mode and Booster! Can you beat your friends? Play now for free!

HIGHLIGHTS
● 100% real-time PvP puzzle game
● Simple game rule: higher score wins in 3 minutes.
● Watch your opponent's board (streaming in real-time)
● Introducing new BOOSTER: Use Hammer to clear blocks on your board
● Introducing All new exciting CHALLENGES in SKILLS MODE:
+ Send any blocks to your opponent to help her or make her game a bit harder.
+ Use SHIELD to protect your board from your opponent

Classes may be online or canceled, but there is no reason for our hand-eye coordination, mental capacity, and cognitive skills to stop getting better. This new fascinating and fast-paced 1vs1 block-based puzzler, with its simple game rule and new booster availability, is not only entertaining and a fun way to connect with friends but also good for the brain!

Ideas on how we can make Woody Battle 2 - Multiplayer even better? Need help with the game? We love to hear from our players! 

Please email us at support-woodybattle2@athena.studio

Love and peace.
